text: Steely Dan was a favorite of mine in a wonderful and uplifting period of my life, when I was a grad student in Madison in the mid-late 70s. I was finally an adult, in love, lots of friends and accomplishments everywhere. Firing on all cylinders. One of the most prime periods of my life. I guess I'm going to listen to a lot of Steely Dan in the next few weeks. Kind of the way we listened to a lot of Prince last year. Donald Fagen wrote about his friendship with Walter Becker. We all were friends with him through their creativity.
